mapper.select: select hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 , hq.health_questionnaire_id , ui.last_login_date , ui.phone_number , ui.registration_date , hq.version , hq.chronic_disease , hq.common_medication , hq.exercise_frequency , ui.password , hq.allergy_history , hq.name , hq.diet_preference , hq.creation_time , hq.residence , hq.update_time , hq.age , ui.username FROM health_questionnaire hq left join user_info ui on hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 , hq.health_questionnaire_id , ui.last_login_date , ui.phone_number , ui.registration_date , hq.version , hq.chronic_disease , hq.common_medication , hq.exercise_frequency , ui.password , hq.allergy_history , hq.name , hq.diet_preference , hq.creation_time , hq.residence , hq.update_time , hq.age , ui.username FROM health_questionnaire hq left join user_info ui on hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 , hq.health_questionnaire_id , ui.last_login_date , ui.phone_number , ui.registration_date , hq.version , hq.chronic_disease , hq.common_medication , hq.exercise_frequency , ui.password , hq.allergy_history , hq.name , hq.diet_preference , hq.creation_time , hq.residence , hq.update_time , hq.age , ui.username FROM health_questionnaire hq left join user_info ui on hq.user_info_user_info_id_1 = ui.user_info_id where hq.health_questionnaire_id = #{id}
